UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Origin and functional diversification of an amphibian defense peptide arsenal.
Literature.Author: Roelants K, Fry BG, Ye L, Stijlemans B, Brys L, Kok P, Clynen E, Schoofs L, Cornelis P, Bossuyt F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=256 µM,Mouse splenocytes:IC50=32-64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=>256µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>256µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=4µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=64µM),Trypanosoma brucei(90-100% Killing=16-256µM)
